title: 401: Pyramid Schemes + Escaping Amway
itunes:title: 401: Pyramid Schemes + Escaping Amway
description:
Today The Broads are joined by Kirsten Chase, a member of the #broadsquad who has a very INSIDE perspective on Amway to share - but FIRST The Broads spend some time breaking down the definition of a pyramid scheme, their origins, the difference between a pyramid scheme VS a MLM, how Amway was started, and Amway’s religious and political ties. Then Kirsten joins to share about how she was raised in an Amway household, how she joined at 18, why/how she decided to leave, the trials that came from her departure, a lot of BTS, and much more! Thank you so much to Kirsten - please send her all the #broadsquad love!
